00022 class WXDLLIMPEXP_FREECHART BarType
00023 {
00024 public:
00025         BarType();
00026         virtual ~BarType();
00027 
00028         virtual void Draw(wxDC &dc, wxRect rc, Axis *horizAxis, Axis *vertAxis, bool vertical, int item, CategoryDataset *dataset);
00029 
00035         void SetBarDraw(int serie, AreaDraw *ad)
00036         {
00037                 m_barDraws.SetAreaDraw(serie, ad);
00038         }
00039 
00040         //
00041         // Called from BarRenderer
00042         //
00043         virtual double GetMinValue(CategoryDataset *dataset);
00044         virtual double GetMaxValue(CategoryDataset *dataset);
00045 
00046 protected:
00047         virtual void GetBar(int item, int serie, CategoryDataset *dataset,
00048                         int &width, wxCoord &shift, double &base, double &value) = 0;
00049 
00050         double m_base;
00051 
00052         AreaDrawCollection m_barDraws;
00053 };
